attributes.action: Build a skate park in Steyning west sussex
attributes.additional_details: It will help kids keep active and will help kids to want to try new things
attributes.background: Young people in steyning and surrounding villages need somewhere to skate and there are only a select few around west sussex, I am 16 so I cannot drive which makes travelling harder so it would be nice to have a local skate park

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

https://www.westsussex.gov.uk/about-the-council/have-your-say/submit-a-petition-to-the-county-council/
